verses.name: Psalms 60:1
verses.text: O God, thou hast cast us off, thou hast scattered us, thou hast been displeased; O turn thyself to us again.

verses.name: Psalms 60:2
verses.text: Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.

verses.name: Psalms 60:3
verses.text: Thou hast shewed thy people hard things: thou hast made us to drink the wine of astonishment.

verses.name: Psalms 60:4
verses.text: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 60:5
verses.text: That thy beloved may be delivered; save with thy right hand, and hear me.
